original_title: Public sector employees contesting LG poll to be reinstated
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): Cabinet has granted approval to reinstate the public sector employees who submitted nominations to contest the local government elections.
Requests were made to reinstate them in the public service following continuous delays in holding the election, and uncertainty surrounding it.
700 dengue cases recorded in three days; Dengue High Risk Zones declared
Draft bill on National Policy Commission to be tabled in parliament soon by Sub-Committee led by Namal
